description: Krushclub is a subgenre of sigilkore, originating in the early 2020s, mixing [[Jersey club]] elements with electronic sound qualities, known for its energetic sound and catchy beats. Similar to [[Glitchcore]], various social media platforms such as TikTok, Instagram and YouTube has spread it across the Internet, most notably following the increasing traction of [[Lumi Athena]]'s "[[Smoke It Off]]" with [[Jnhygs]]. Notable artists who led to this rise in popularity and granted importance to the genre, include [[6arelyhuman]], [[Luci4]], [[Odetari]], and [[Lumi Athena]]. Krushfunk, a subgenre of Krushclub, mixes elements of [[electronic music]] with [[Brazilian Funk|Brazilian funk music]], the term was coined by Xxanteria.{{Citation needed|date=June 2025}}
